body_html: Yeah I saw that. I don't think we will want to do this in general, as some datasets might be more GIL-heavy and this would have a huge perf hit, but an option that makes the data loader use threads instead of subprocesses should be quite easy to implement.
body_text: Yeah I saw that. I don't think we will want to do this in general, as some datasets might be more GIL-heavy and this would have a huge perf hit, but an option that makes the data loader use threads instead of subprocesses should be quite easy to implement.
body: Yeah I saw that. I don't think we will want to do this in general, as some datasets might be more GIL-heavy and this would have a huge perf hit, but an option that makes the data loader use threads instead of subprocesses should be quite easy to implement.
